1.verse: Amazwi eNtshumayeli, unyana kaDavide, ukumkani waseYerusalem.

2.verse: Amampunge awo amampunge, itsho iNtshumayeli; amampunge awo amampunge, yonke into ingamampunge.

3.verse: Unalungelo lini umntu emigudwini yakhe yonke, ayenzayo phantsi kwelanga?

4.verse: Kumka esinye isizukulwana, kulandele esinye isizukulwana; ke lona ihlabathi limi ngonaphakade.

5.verse: Ilanga liyaphuma, ilanga libuya litshone, liphikele endaweni yalo apho liphuma khona.

6.verse: Umoya uya ezantsi, ujikeleze usinge entla, uhamba ujikajikeleza, ubuye ubuya umoya ekujikelezeni kwawo.

7.verse: Yonke imilambo iya elwandle, ukanti ulwandle aluzali;  endaweni eya kuyo imilambo, ibuya iye kwakhona.

8.verse: Zonke izinto ziyazixhamla; umntu akanako ukuzithetha;  alihluthi iliso kukubona, ayizali indlebe kukuva.

9.verse: Into eyayikho yeya kubuya ibekho; into eyenzekayo yeya kubuya yenzeke yona. Akukho nto intsha phantsi kwelanga.

10.verse: Ukuba kukho into ekuthiwa, Yabona, le intsha! ibiselikho kade, emaphakadeni abekho ngaphambi kwethu.

11.verse: Akukho kukhumbula abokuqala; nabasemva abaya kubakho, abayi kukhunjulwa ngabaya kuza emva kwabo.

12.verse: Mna, Ntshumayeli, ndibe ndingukumkani kwaSirayeli eYerusalem.

13.verse: Intliziyo yam ndayinikela ukuba ingxoke, isingasinge ngobulumko, yonke into eyenzekayo phantsi kwezulu; ngumzamo ombi uThixo awunike oonyana babantu, ukuba bawuzame.

14.verse: Ndazikhangela zonke izenzo ezenzekayo phantsi kwelanga;  yabona, zonke zingamampunge nokusukelana nomoya.

15.verse: Into egoso ayinakolulwa; into engekhoyo ayinakubalwa.

16.verse: Ndathetha mna nentliziyo yam, ndisithi, Yabona, mna ndikhulise ndandisa ubulumko, ngaphezu kwabo bonke ababephethe iYerusalem phambi kwam; nentliziyo yam ibone kakhulu ubulumko nokwazi.

17.verse: Intliziyo yam ndayinikela ekwazini ubulumko, nasekwazini ubugeza nobuyatha; kwanaloo nto ndayiqonda ukuba kukusukelana nomoya.

18.verse: Ngokuba ebuninzini bobulumko kukho ukuhlelwa sisiyengelezane esininzi; owongeza ukwazi, wongeza umvandedwa.

1.verse: Ndathi mna entliziyweni yam, Khawuze khe ndikulinge ngovuyo,  ubone okulungileyo. Yabona, kwanaloo nto ingamampunge.

2.verse: Ndathi kohlekayo, Uyageza; nakovuyayo, Wenza ntoni na lo?

3.verse: Ndasingasinga entliziyweni yam ukuba nditsale inyama yam ngewayini, ekubeni intliziyo yam iziqhuba ngobulumko: ukuba ndazane nobuyatha, ndide ndibone ukuba yiyiphi na into ebalungeleyo oonyana babantu, ukuze bayenze phantsi kwezulu,  ngemihla embalwa yobomi babo.

4.verse: Ndazenzela imisebenzi emikhulu, ndazakhela izindlu:  ndazityalela izidiliya,

5.verse: ndazenzela amasimi nemiyezo, ndatyala kuyo imithi eneziqhamo zonke;

6.verse: ndazenzela amachibi amanzi okunyela ihlathi elihluma imithi;

7.verse: ndathenga amakhoboka namakhobokazana, ndaba nawo nazalelwe endlwini yam. Kananjalo imfuyo yeenkomo neyempahla emfutshane yaba ninzi kum, ngaphezu kwabo bonke ababengaphambi kwam eYerusalem.

8.verse: Ndaziqwebela nesilivere, negolide, nezinto eziziinqobo zookumkani ngookumkani, nezamazwe ngamazwe; ndazenzela iimvumi neemvumikazi, neziyolo zoonyana babantu, inkosikazi namakhosikazi.

9.verse: Ndaba mkhulu ke, ndanda ngaphezu kwabo bonke ababeseYerusalem ngaphambi kwam; bathi nobulumko bam bandinceda.

10.verse: Andiwabandezanga into yonke ayibizayo amehlo am;  andiyivimbanga intliziyo yam namnye umvuyo; ngokuba intliziyo yam yayivuya emigudwini yam yonke, saba sesi ke isabelo sam emigudwini yam yonke.

11.verse: Ndabheka mna ezenzweni zam zonke, ezazenzayo izandla zam,  nasemigudwini yam endaphuka yiyo ukuyenza; ndayibona ukuba yonke loo nto ingamampunge nokusukelana nomoya; akukho lungelo phantsi kwelanga.

12.verse: Ndazijika mna, ndakhangela ubulumko, nobugeza, nobuyatha:  ngokuba ngumntu oyini na, lowo uya kuza emva kokumkani? lo ubeselenziwe kade?

13.verse: Ndabona ukuba ubulumko buyabugqitha ubuyatha, njengokuba ukukhanya kubugqitha ubumnyama.

14.verse: Isilumko, amehlo aso asentlokweni yaso; ke sona isinyabi sihamba emnyameni. Ndaqonda ke mna ukuba bonke bephela bahlelwa sihlo sinye.

15.verse: Ndathi mna entliziyweni yam, Njengoko sihlelwa kuko isinyabi, ndiya kuhlelwa kuko nam lo: ibiyini na ke ukuba ndisidlule mna ngokulumka? Ndathi entliziyweni yam, Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge.

16.verse: Ngokuba isilumko kunye nesinyabi asinakukhunjulwa kungunaphakade, ekubeni kusiza iimini ezoba sezilityelwe zonke ezo nto. Kutheni na, ukuba zife izilumko kunye nezinyabi?

17.verse: Ndabuthiya ke ubomi; ngokuba mibi kum imisebenzi eyenzeka phantsi kwelanga; ngokuba yonke loo nto ingamampunge,  nokusukelana nomoya.

18.verse: Ndayithiya yonke imigudu yam, endaphuka yiyo phantsi kwelanga, ekubeni ndiya kuyishiya nomntu oya kubakho emva kwam.

19.verse: Waziwa ngubani na, ukuba woba sisilumko, nokuba woba sisiyatha, kusini na? Ukanti uya kugunyazela emigudwini yam yonke endaphuka yiyo, endalumkayo kuyo phantsi kwelanga;  kwanaloo nto ingamampunge.

20.verse: Ndajika ke mna, ndayincamisisa intliziyo yam ngemigudu yonke endaphuka yiyo phantsi kwelanga.

21.verse: Ngokuba kubakho umntu omigudu yakhe inobulumko, inokwazi,  inempumelelo; ukanti uya kuyinika umntu ongenzanga migudu, ibe sisabelo sakhe; kwanaloo nto ingamampunge nobubi obukhulu.

22.verse: Ngokuba umntu uba nantoni na ngemigudu yakhe yonke,  nangenzondelelo yentliziyo yakhe, aphuka yiyo yena phantsi kwelanga?

23.verse: Ngokuba imihla yakhe yonke inomvandedwa, nasekuzameni kwakhe ukhathazekile, nasebusuku ayiphumli intliziyo yakhe;  kwanaloo nto ingamampunge.

24.verse: Akukho nto ilungileyo ebantwini kunokuba badle, basele,  bawubonise umphefumlo wabo okulungileyo emigudwini yabo.  Kwanaloo nto ndiyibonile, ukuba ivela esandleni sikaThixo.

25.verse: Ngokuba ngubani na ongadlayo, ngubani na ongavayo ubumnandi, engenaye?

26.verse: Ngokuba umntu olungileyo phambi kwakhe umnika ubulumko nokwazi novuyo; ke yena umoni umnika umzamo wokuhlanganisa nokuqweba, ukuze loo nto ayinike olungileyo phambi koThixo.  Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge nokusukelana nomoya.

1.verse: Into yonke inexesha elimisiweyo, nomcimbi wonke unexesha lawo phantsi kwezulu:

2.verse: ukuzala kunexesha lako, ukufa kunexesha lako; ukutyala kunexesha lako, ukunyothula okutyelweyo kunexesha lako;

3.verse: ukubulala kunexesha lako, ukuphilisa kunexesha lako;  ukuchitha kunexesha lako, ukwakha kunexesha lako;

4.verse: ukulila kunexesha lako; ukuhleka kunexesha lako; kukho ixesha lokulila umbambazelo, kukho nexesha lokudloba;

5.verse: kukho ixesha lokuchithachitha amatye, kukho nexesha lokufumba amatye; ukuwola kunexesha lako, ukuyeka ukuwola kunexesha lako;

6.verse: ukufuna kunexesha lako, ukulahlekelwa kunexesha lako;  ukugcina kunexesha lako, ukulahla kunexesha lako;

7.verse: ukukrazula kunexesha lako, ukuthunga kunexesha lako; ukuthi cwaka kunexesha lako, ukuthetha kunexesha lako;

8.verse: ukuthanda kunexesha lako, ukuthiya kunexesha lako; kukho ixesha lemfazwe, kukho nexesha loxolo.

9.verse: Unalungelo lini na lowo usebenzayo, kuloo nto ayenzela imigudu?

10.verse: Ndiwubonile umzamo, awunike oonyana babantu uThixo, ukuba bawuzame.

11.verse: Zonke izinto uzenze zantle ngexesha lazo; kwanephakade ulinikele ezintliziyweni zabo ngohlobo lokuba umntu angasifumani isenzo asenzayo uThixo, athabathele ekuqaleni ade ase ekupheleni.

12.verse: Ndiyazi ke ukuba akukho nto ilungileyo phakathi kwabo,  ingekukuvuya nokuzizuzela okulungileyo ebomini babo.

13.verse: Kwanokuba wonke umntu adle, asele, abone okulungileyo emigudwini yakhe yonke: sisipho sikaThixo eso.

14.verse: Ndiyazi ke ukuba yonke into aya kuyenza uThixo, yiyo eya kuba ngonaphakade; kungongezwa nto kuyo, kungacatshulwa nto kuyo: uThixo ukwenzela ukuba koyikwe ebusweni bakhe.

15.verse: Le nto ikhoyo ibiselikho kade; nento eya kubakho ibiselikho kade. UThixo ke ubuya ayifune into egxothiweyo.

16.verse: Ndabuya ndabona phantsi kwelanga indawo yokugweba, ukuba okungendawo kukhona; nendawo yobulungisa, ukuba okungendawo kukhona.

17.verse: Ndathi mna entliziyweni yam, Nolilungisa nongendawo, uThixo uya kulithetha ityala labo; ngokuba umise ixesha layo yonke imicimbi, nazo zonke izenzo.

18.verse: Ndathi mna entliziyweni yam, Kungenxa yoonyana babantu,  ukuze uThixo abahlele, nokuze bazibone benjengeenkomo bona ngokwabo.

19.verse: Ngokuba bayahlelwa oonyana babantu, ziyahlelwa neenkomo,  sinye isihlo kubo nakuzo; njengoko kunjalo ukufa kwabo, kunjalo ukufa kwazo; mnye umoya kubo bonke nakuzo zonke; akukho kuyigqitha komntu inkomo; ngokuba zonke ezo nto zingamampunge.

20.verse: Zonke ezo nto ziya ndaweni-nye; zonke ezo nto zavela eluthulini, zonke ezo nto zibuyela eluthulini.

21.verse: Ngubani na owaziyo umoya woonyana babantu, ukuba uyenyuka na uye phezulu; nomoya wenkomo, ukuba uyehla na uye phantsi emhlabeni?

22.verse: Ndaqonda ke ukuba akukho nto ilunge ngaphezu kokuba umntu avuye ezenzweni zakhe; ngokuba kusisabelo sakhe oko. Ngokuba uya kungeniswa ngubani na, ukuba akubone okuya kubakho emveni kwakhe?

1.verse: Ndabuya ke mna, ndakubona konke ukucudisa okwenziwayo phantsi kwelanga. Ndazibona iinyembezi zabacudisiweyo,  bengenamthuthuzeli; esandleni sabacudisi babo kuphuma ububhovubhovu, bengenamthuthuzeli bona.

2.verse: Ndabancoma ke mna abafileyo, abasebefe kade, kunabahleliyo abasahleliyo ngoku.

3.verse: Ke ulungile kunabo bobabini lowo ungekabikho, ungakubonanga ukwenza okubi okwenziwa phantsi kwelanga.

4.verse: Kananjalo ndayiqonda ke mna yonke imigudu, nayo yonke impumelelo yomsebenzi, ukuba ingumona wokwanyelana. Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge, nokusukelana nomoya.

5.verse: Isinyabi sikhwabusha izandla, sidle kwaeyaso inyama.

6.verse: Kulungile ukuzalisa sandla sinye ngokuphumla, kunokuzalisa zozibini izandla ngemigudu nokusukelana nomoya.

7.verse: Ndabuya mna, ndabona amampunge phantsi kwelanga.

8.verse: Kukho oba yedwa, ongenaye owesibini, ongenanyana namzalwana;  ingena siphelo imigudu yakhe yonke, angahluthiyo noko bubutyebi amehlo akhe. Akatsho ukuthi, Ndaphukela bani na, ndiwuhlutha nje umphefumlo wam okulungileyo? Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge,  ingumzamo ombi yona.

9.verse: Kulungile ukuba babe ngababini kunokuba abe mnye, kuba banomvuzo olungileyo ngemigudu yabo.

10.verse: Ngokuba xa bathe bawa, omnye unokumphakamisa uwabo; yeha ke, yena oyedwa, othe wawa! kuba akukho wesibini wokumphakamisa.

11.verse: Kananjalo ababini, bathe balala, baya kuva ukusitha;  angathini na ukuva ukusitha olele yedwa?

12.verse: Ukuba umntu uthe wamgagamela oyedwa, bona ababini baya kumisa phambi kwakhe; umsonto ontluntathu awuhle uqhawulwe.

13.verse: Ulungile umntwana olihlwempu elumkile, ngaphezu kokumkani oselemkhulu, esisidenge, ongasakuvayo ukuyalwa.

14.verse: Ngokuba uphuma endlwini yamakhonkxwa ukuba abe ngukumkani;  ukanti uzalelwe ebukumkanini balowo ulihlwempu.

15.verse: Ndababona bonke abadla ubomi, behamba phantsi kwelanga kunye naye umntwana, lo ungowesibini, uza kuma esikhundleni salowo.

16.verse: Akukho kuphela kwabantu bonke, kwabo bonke angaphambi kwabo; ukanti amavela-mva akayi kuvuya ngaye. Ngokuba kwanaloo nto ingamampunge nokusukelana nomoya.

1.verse: Gcina unyawo lwakho xeshikweni uya endlwini kaThixo;  ukusondela ukuba uve, kungaphezu kokunikela kwezidenge imibingelelo; ngokuba ukungazi kwazo kwenza izinto ezimbi.

2.verse: Musa ukungxama ngomlomo wakho, intliziyo yakho ingaphangi ikhuphe ilizwi phambi koThixo; ngokuba uThixo usemazulwini, ke wena usehlabathini; ngenxa yoko amazwi akho makabe mancinane.

3.verse: Ngokuba ukuphupha kuza ngobuninzi bemicimbi, nezwi lesidenge liza ngobuninzi bentetho.

4.verse: Xeshikweni uthe wabhambathisa isibhambathiso kuThixo, musa ukuzekelela ukusizalisa; ngokuba azinanzwa izidenge; loo nto uyibhambathisileyo yizalise.

5.verse: Kulungile ukuba ungabhambathisi, kunokuba ubhambathise ungazalisi.

6.verse: Musa ukuwuvumela umlomo wakho, ukuba uyonise inyama yakho;  ungatsho phambi komthunywa kaThixo ukuthi ibikukulahleka. Yini na ukuba uThixo abe noburhalarhume ngezwi lakho asonakalise isenzo sezandla zakho?

7.verse: Ngokuba ebuninzini bamaphupha namazwi, maninzi amampunge; ke yoyika uThixo.

8.verse: Ukuba uthe wakubona ukucudiswa kwehlwempu, nokuhluthwa kokusesikweni nobulungisa elizweni, musa ukumangaliswa yiloo nto; ngokuba oyena uphakamileyo ukhangele phezu kophakamileyo;  kukho abaphakamileyo naphezu kwabo.

9.verse: Ilungelo lelizwe entweni yonke ngukumkani onyamekela umhlaba.

10.verse: Othanda isilivere akaneliswa yisilivere; nalowo uthanda intabalala, akangenelwa nto. Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge.

11.verse: Ekwandeni kwezinto ezilungileyo bayanda abazidlayo zona,  abe umninizo enempumelelo eyini na, ingekuko ukwanela ukuzibona ngamehlo?

12.verse: Bumnandi ubuthongo bosebenzayo, nokuba incinane, nokuba ininzi into ayidlayo; ke intabalala yesityebi ayisivumeli ukuba silale buthongo.

13.verse: Kukho ububi obusisifo, endibubonileyo phantsi kwelanga;  ukuthi ubutyebi obugcinelwe umninibo, bube nobubi kuye;

14.verse: obo butyebi butshabalala ngento embi; uzala unyana,  engenayo nento esandleni sakhe.

15.verse: Njengokuba waphuma esizalweni sonina eze, uya kubuya emke njengoko weza enjalo, angathabathi nento ngemigudu yakhe,  angayiphathayo ngesandla sakhe.

16.verse: Kwanale nto bububi obusisifo, ukuba eya kumka kanye kwanjengoko weza ngako: unalungelo lini na ke owaphukela umoya?

17.verse: Kananjalo iimini zakhe zonke uzidlela emnyameni, enengqumbo enkulu, nesifo, noburhalarhume.

18.verse: Nantsi into endiyibonileyo mna, ilungile, intle: into yokuthi umntu adle, asele, abone okulungileyo ngemigudu yakhe yonke aphuka yiyo phantsi kwelanga, ngokwenani lemihla yobomi bakhe amnikileyo uThixo; ngokuba kusisabelo sakhe oko.

19.verse: Kananjalo wonke umntu, athe uThixo wamnika ubutyebi nokuqweba, wamnika negunya lokudla kubo, athabathe isabelo sakhe, avuye emigudwini yakhe: sisipho sikaThixo eso.

20.verse: Ngokuba akayikhumbuli kakhulu imihla yobomi bakhe; ngokuba uThixo eluphendula uvuyo lwentliziyo yakhe.

1.verse: Kukho ububi endibubonileyo phantsi kwelanga, buninzi ke phezu komntu:

2.verse: yindoda uThixo ayinike ubutyebi, nokuqweba, nozuko,  ungasweli umphefumlo wayo nanye into engayinqwenelayo, aze uThixo angayiphi amandla okuyidla; ngokuba idliwa yenye indoda.  Ngamampunge lawo, sisifo esibi eso.

3.verse: Ukuba umntu uthe wazala ikhulu labantwana, wadla ubomi iminyaka emininzi, yamininzi imihla yeminyaka yakhe, umphefumlo wakhe awahlutha zizinto ezilungileyo, kananjalo akaba nangcwaba: ndithi mna, imvambilini ilungile kunaye.

4.verse: Ngokuba ifike ingamampunge, imka kumnyama, igama layo ligutyungelwe bubumnyama;

5.verse: kananjalo ayilibonanga ilanga, ayilazanga; le yona ilungile kunomntu lowo.

6.verse: Nokuba ebeya kudla ubomi iwaka leminyaka kude kube kabini,  angakuboni okulungileyo, ayiyi ndaweni-nye na yonke loo nto?

7.verse: Yonke imigudu yomntu uyenzela umlomo wakhe: ukanti umphefumlo awuzali.

8.verse: Ngokuba isilumko sisigqitha ngantoni na isidenge? Usigqitha ngantoni na olusizana, okwaziyo ukuhamba phambi kwabaphilileyo?

9.verse: Kulungile ukubona kwamehlo ngaphezu kokuhambahamba komphefumlo. Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge nokusukelana nomoya.

10.verse: Loo nto iselikho, yabe iselithiywe kade igama layo; yaziwa into aya kuba yiyo umntu; akanakumelana nalowo unokumeyisa.

11.verse: Ngokuba kukho amazwi amaninzi nje, andisa amampunge; umntu unalungelo lini na ngaloo nto?

12.verse: Ngokuba ngubani na owaziyo okumlungeleyo umntu ebomini,  ngangenani lemihla yobomi bakhe obungamampunge, ayigqiba njengesithunzi? Ngokuba ngubani na onokumxelela umntu into eya kubakho emva kwakhe phantsi kwelanga?

1.verse: Igama elilungileyo lingaphezulu nakwioli elungileyo;  ulungile umhla wokufa ngaphezu komhla wokuzalwa komntu.

2.verse: Kulungile ukuya endlwini yesijwili kunokuya endlwini yemigidi; kuba oko kukuphela kwabantu bonke, aze ophilileyo akunyamekele ngentliziyo oko.

3.verse: Kulungile ukuba nosizi ngaphezu kokuhleka; ngokuba intliziyo iyalunga bububi bobuso.

4.verse: Intliziyo yezilumko isendlwini yesijwili; ke intliziyo yezidenge isendlwini yovuyo.

5.verse: Kulungile ukuva ukukhalimela kwesilumko, kunokuba umntu eve ingoma yezidenge.

6.verse: Ngokuba njengokuqhuqhumba kwevaba ngaphantsi kwembiza,  kunjalo ukuhleka kwesidenge; naloo nto ingamampunge.

7.verse: Ngokuba ukucudisa kugezisa isilumko, siyitshabalalise intliziyo isicengo.

8.verse: Kulungile ukugqitywa kwendawo, ngaphezu kokuqalwa kwayo;  ulungile umoya ozeka kade umsindo, kunomoya ozidlayo.

9.verse: Musa ukukungxamela ukuqumba ngomoya wakho, ngokuba ingqumbo ilala esifubeni sezidenge.

10.verse: Musa ukuthi, Ibiyini na, le nto imihla yamandulo ibilungile ngaphezu kwale? ngokuba akuthabatheli ebulumkweni ukuyibuza loo nto.

11.verse: Bulungile ubulumko, bunelifa, bulilungelo kwabalibonayo ilanga.

12.verse: Ngokuba ubulumko bungumthunzi, imali ingumthunzi; ke ukugqithisela kokwazi, kukuba ubulumko buyabasindisa abo banabo.

13.verse: Wukhangele umsebenzi kaThixo; ngokuba ngubani na onokolula into ayenze yagoso?

14.verse: Ngomhla wentsikelelo chwayitha, nangomhla wobubi qonda kakuhle, ukuba nalo, kwanjengalowa, wenziwe nguThixo, ngenxa enokuba umntu engafumani nto emva kwakhe.

15.verse: Le nto yonke ndiyibonile ngemihla yam engamampunge: kubakho ilungisa elitshabalalayo noko linobulungisa, kubekho ongendawo ophila ixesha elide, noko angendawo.

16.verse: Musa ukuba lilungisa ngokukhulu, ungabi sisilumko ngokugqithiseleyo; yini na ukuba uziphanzise?

17.verse: Musa ukuba ngongendawo ngokukhulu, ungazenzi isidenge; yini na ukuba ufe lingekabi lixesha lakho?

18.verse: Kulungile ukuba ubambelele kule nto nakuleya, ungasiphumzi isandla sakho; ngokuba owoyika uThixo uphumelela kuzo zonke ziphela.

19.verse: Ubulumko buyasiqinisa isilumko, ngaphezu kweshumi labanegunya abakulo mzi.

20.verse: Ngokuba akukho mntu ulilungisa ehlabathini, wenza okulungileyo, angoni.

21.verse: Kananjalo musa ukuyinikela intliziyo yakho kumazwi onke athethwayo, ukuze ungevi umkhonzi wakho, eselekutshabhisa;

22.verse: ngokuba intliziyo yakho nayo iyazi izihlandlo ezininzi,  ukuba uyabatshabhisa abanye nawe.

23.verse: Ezo zinto zonke ndizilingile ngobulumko; ndathi ndiya kulumka; ke bona baba kude kum.

24.verse: Hayi, ukuba kude kwezinto ezikhoyo, zinzulu kakhulu;  ngubani na oya kuzifumana?

25.verse: Ndajika ke mna, ndanentliziyo enga ingazi, ingasingasinga,  ifume ubulumko nesigqibo seengcinga; enga ingakwazi okungendawo ukuba kukunyaba, nokumatha ukuba kukugeza.

26.verse: Ndayifumana ikrakra ngaphezu kokufa, inkazana eyiyimigibe iphela, ezizibatha intliziyo yayo, ezandla zingamakhamandela olungileyo phambi koThixo uya kusinda kuyo, ke yena umoni uya kubanjiswa yiyo.

27.verse: Yabona into endiyifumeneyo, itsho iNtshumayeli, ndihloma enye kwenye, ukuba ndifumane isigqibo seengcinga;

28.verse: obumana ukuyifuna umphefumlo wam, ndingayifumani, nantsi:  indoda enye ewakeni ndiyifumene, ke yona inkazana kulo lonke andiyifumananga.

29.verse: Yabona, le nto yodwa ndiyifumene, yokuba uThixo wamenza umntu wathi tye; ke bona bafune ubuqili obuninzi.

1.verse: Ngubani na onjengesilumko esi? Ngubani na okwaziyo ukuconjululwa kwendawo? Ubulumko bomntu bukhanyisa ubuso bakhe, buguqulwe ubungwanyalala bobuso bakhe.

2.verse: Mna ndithi, Umthetho wokumkani wugcine, ngenxa yesifungo sikaThixo.

3.verse: Musa ukukungxamela ukumka ebusweni bakhe; ungangeni kwiyelenqe; ngokuba into yonke ayinanzileyo uyayenza.

4.verse: Ekubeni ilizwi lokumkani linegunya, ngubani na onokuthi kuye, Wenza ntoni na?

5.verse: Ogcina umthetho akazi nto imbi; intliziyo yesilumko iyalazi ixesha nesi gwebo;

6.verse: ngokuba yonke imicimbi inexesha nesigwebo; ngokuba ububi bomntu buba buninzi phezu kwakhe;

7.verse: ngokuba engayazi into eya kubakho. Ngokuba ngubani na onokumxelela njengoko kuya kuba njalo?

8.verse: Akukho mntu unokuwugunyazela umoya, awuthintele umoya;  akukho unokuyigunyazela imini yokufa; akukho kukhululeka kuloo mfazwe; okungendawo akunakubasiza abaniniko.

9.verse: Le nto yonke ndiyibonile, ndayinikela intliziyo yam kwizenzo zonke ezenziwayo phantsi kwelanga, ngexesha athi umntu agunyazele umntu, kube kubi kuye.

10.verse: Ekubeni kunjalo, ndibone abangendawo bengcwatywa, begoduka;  besithi endaweni engcwele bemke abo benze okulungileyo,  balityalwe kuloo mzi.

11.verse: Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge. Ekubeni isigwebo singawiswa kamsinyane emsebenzini ombi, ngenxa yoko intliziyo yoonyana babantu izele ngaphakathi kwabo kukwenza okubi.

12.verse: Nakubeni umoni esenza okubi izihlandlo ezilikhulu, ayolule imihla yakhe, noko ndiyazi ukuba kuya kulunga kwabamoyikayo uThixo, kwaboyikayo ebusweni bakhe;

13.verse: kungalungi kongendawo, angayoluli imihla yakhe,  njengethunzi; ekubeni engoyiki ebusweni bukaThixo.

14.verse: Kukho amampunge enzekayo ehlabathini: ukuba kukho amalungisa ahlelwa ngokokwenza kwabangendawo; kukho nabangendawo abahlelwa ngokokwenza kwamalungisa; ndathi,  kwanaloo nto ingamampunge.

15.verse: Ndaluncoma ke mna uvuyo, ngokuba kungekho nto imlungeleyo umntu phantsi kwelanga, ngaphezu kokuba adle, asele, avuye; loo nto ithane mbende naye emigudwini yakhe, ngemihla yobomi bakhe amnikayo uThixo phantsi kwelanga.

16.verse: Xeshikweni ndayinikelayo intliziyo yam ukuba ndibazi ubulumko, ndiwubone umzamo owenzekayo ehlabathini (ngokuba nasemini nasebusuku ababoni buthongo ngamehlo abo),

17.verse: ndasibona ke sonke isenzo sikaThixo, ukuba akanako umntu ukusifumana isenzo eso senzekayo phantsi kwelanga; nakubeni umntu esaphuka ukusifuna, akasifumani. Nokuba sithe isilumko safuna ukwazi, asinakufumana.

1.verse: Ngokuba yonke le nto ndayinyamekela ngentliziyo yam,  ndayihlela yonke le nto, yokuba amalungisa, nezilumko,  nemisebenzi yabo, isesandleni sikaThixo; nokuthanda nokuthiya,  akukhona ekwazini kwabantu; le nto yonke basebeyimiselwe.

2.verse: Izinto zonke zibahlela ngokufanayo bonke: sinye isihlo kwilungisa nakongendawo; kolungileyo, kohlambulukileyo,  nakoyinqambi; kobingelelayo nakongabingeleliyo; njengoko anjalo olungileyo, unjalo nomoni; ofungayo unjengalowo ukoyikayo ukufunga.

3.verse: Le yinto embi phakathi kwezinto zonke ezenzekayo phantsi kwelanga, ukuthi sibe sinye isihlo kubo bonke; ibe nentliziyo yoonyana babantu izele bububi; ibubugeza entliziyweni yabo besadla ubomi; emveni kwabo kuyiwa kwabafileyo.

4.verse: Ngokuba kosukuba ehlonyelwa kwabasadla ubomi, kusekho ithemba; ngokuba inja esaphilileyo ilunge ngaphezu kwengonyama efileyo.

5.verse: Ngokuba abadla ubomi bayazi ukuba baya kufa; ke bona abafileyo abazi lutho, abasabi namvuzo; ngokuba balityelwe,  abasakhunjulwa nganto.

6.verse: Seluphelile kade uthando lwabo, nentiyo yabo, nekhwele labo;  abasenasabelo naphakade ezintweni zonke ezenzekayo phantsi kwelanga.

7.verse: Yiya udle isonka sakho unovuyo, usele iwayini yakho unentliziyo echwayithileyo; ngokuba sekukade ekholisiwe uThixo zizenzo zakho.

8.verse: Iingubo zakho mazibe mhlophe ngamaxesha onke, neoli mayingasweleki entlokweni yakho.

9.verse: Hlala kakuhle nomfazi omthandileyo ngemihla yonke yobomi bakho obungamampunge, akunikileyo phantsi kwelanga, ngemihla yakho yonke engamampunge; ngokuba sisabelo sakho eso ebomini,  nasemigudwini yakho owaphuka yiyo phantsi kwelanga.

10.verse: Yonke into esiyifumanayo isandla sakho ukuba siyenze, yenze ngamandla akho; ngokuba akukho kwenza, nakucinga, nakwazi,  nakulumka kwelabafileyo, apho uya khona wena.

11.verse: Ndabuya ndabona phantsi kwelanga, ukuba ukugidima asikokwabanamendu, imfazwe asiyeyamagorha; kananjalo isonka asisesezilumko; kananjalo ubutyebi asibobabanenqiqo; kananjalo ubabalo asilolwabanokwazi; ngokuba bonke bephela bafikelwa lixesha nasisihlo.

12.verse: Ngokuba umntu akalazi nexesha lakhe; njengeentlanzi ezibanjiswe ngomnatha ombi, nanjengeentaka ezibanjiswe ngomgibe, banjalo ukurhintyelwa kwabo oonyana babantu ngexesha elibi, xa libawele ngesiquphe.

13.verse: Nale nto ndiyibone ibubulumko phantsi kwelanga, babukhulu kum:

14.verse: umzi omncinane unamadoda ambalwa; kweza kuwo ukumkani omkhulu, wawungqinga, wawakhela iimboniselo ezinkulu.

15.verse: Wafumana kuwo indoda elihlwempu inobulumko; yona yawusiza umzi ngobulumko bayo; ke akubangakho mntu ubuya ayikhumbule le ndoda ilihlwempu.

16.verse: Ndathi ke mna, Bulunge ubulumko ngaphezu kobugorha; kodwa ubulumko beli hlwempu budelekile, namazwi alo akaviwa.

17.verse: Amazwi ezilumko, eviwe ngokuthozama, angaphezu kokunkqangaza kolawula phakathi kwezidenge.

18.verse: Bulunge ubulumko ngaphezu kweempahla zokulwa; ke yena umoni emnye utshabalalisa okulungileyo okuninzi.

1.verse: Iimpukane ezifileyo zinukisa zibilise amafutha omqholi;  ubudenge obuncinane bunzima kunobulumko nozuko.

2.verse: Intliziyo yesilumko ingasekunene kwaso: intliziyo yesidenge ingasekhohlo kwaso.

3.verse: Ewe, nasendleleni, xa sithe isidenge sahamba ngayo,  siyayiswela intliziyo, sihambe sisithi kubantu bonke,  Ndisisidenge.

4.verse: Ukuba ukufutha komlawuli kuthe kwenyuka kwakuchasa, musa ukuyishiya indawo yakho; ngokuba ubulali buleleza izono ezikhulu.

5.verse: Kukho ububi endibubonileyo phantsi kwelanga,  obunjengokulahleka okuphuma konegunya:

6.verse: ubudenge bunikwa iindawo eziphezulu ezinkulu, zibe izityebi zihleli kwiindawo eziphantsi.

7.verse: Ke ndizibone izicaka zikhwele emahasheni, namatshawe ehamba phantsi ngeenyawo njengezicaka.

8.verse: Omba isigingqi, angeyela kuso; ochitha uthango, inyoka ingamluma.

9.verse: Omba amatye, angenzakala; ocanda iinkuni angaba semngciphekweni.

10.verse: Ukuba intsimbi ithe yaba buthuntu, akalulola uhlangothi lwayo, wogonyela ngoko ngamandla; ke ubulumko buyanceda bulungise.

11.verse: Ukuba inyoka ithe yaluma kungekho kukhafula, akabi nanzuzo umnyangi.

12.verse: Amazwi omlomo wesilumko anokubabala; ke yona imilebe yomlomo wesidenge iginya kwasona.

13.verse: Ingqalo, yamazwi omlomo waso bubudenge, nengqibo yomlomo waso bubugeza obubi.

14.verse: Isidenge sandisa amazwi, engakwazi umntu okuya kubakho nokuya kubakho emva kwakhe, ngubani na onokumxelela?

15.verse: Imigudu yezidenge iyazixhamla, ezingakwaziyo ukuya emzini.

16.verse: Yeha, wena lizwe likumkani ungumntwana, limatshawe adla kwakusasa!

17.verse: Hayi, uyolo lwakho, lizwe likumkani ungunyana wabanumzana,  limatshawe adlayo ngexesha elililo, enobugorha, engenamithayi!

18.verse: Ngobuvila iyabhena imiqadi; ngokuthamba kwezandla iyanetha indlu.

19.verse: Benza isidlo ukuba bahleke, iwayini ivuyise ubomi; imali ilungele iinto zonke.

20.verse: Musa ukumtshabhisa ukumkani, nasesazeleni sakho,  ungasitshabhisi nesityebi ezingontsini zakho zokulala; ngokuba intaka yasendle yolihambisa elo zwi, nento enamaphiko iyixele loo ntetho.

1.verse: Siphose isonka sakho phezu kwamanzi, ngokuba wosifumana kwakuba ziintsuku ezininzi.

2.verse: Yahlula izahlulo zibe sixhenxe, zibe sibhozo, ngokuba akuyazi into embi eya kubakho ehlabathini.

3.verse: Ukuba amafu athe azala yimvula, ayithululela emhlabeni;  ukuba umthi uthe wawa, wabheka ezantsi, nokuba uthe wabheka entla, kuloo ndawo uwe kuyo umthi lowo, wolala khona.

4.verse: Ogqala umoya akayi kuhlwayela; okhangela amafu akayi kuvuna.

5.verse: Njengokuba ungayazi ukuba yiyiphi na indlela yomoya,  kwanjengokuyilwa kwamathambo esiswini somithiyo; ngokunjalo akusazi isenzo sikaThixo owenza izinto zonke.

6.verse: Kusasa hlwayela imbewu yakho, nangokuhlwa ungasiphumzi isandla sakho; ngokuba ungazi ukuba kolunga yiphi na, nokuba yile nokuba yileya, kusini na, nokuba zolunga ngakunye zombini na.

7.verse: Kumnandi ukukhanya, kulungile emehlweni ukulibona ilanga.

8.verse: Ngokuba umntu, ukuba uthe wadla ubomi iminyaka emininzi,  makavuye ngayo yonke iphela, noko ke akhumbule imihla yobumnyama, ukuba iya kuba mininzi. Yonke into ezayo ingamampunge.

9.verse: Vuya, ndodana, ebutsheni bakho, ikuchwayithise intliziyo yakho ngemihla yobudodana bakho, uhambe ngeendlela zentliziyo yakho, nangokukhangela kwamehlo akho; kodwa yazi ukuba ngenxa yezo zinto zonke uThixo uya kukusa ematyaleni.

10.verse: Yisuse ke ingqumbo entliziyweni yakho, ubudlulise ububi enyameni yakho; ngokuba ubutsha nobudoda bungamampunge.

1.verse: Uze umkhumbule ke uMdali wakho ngemihla yobutsha bakho,  ingekezi imihla yobubi, ingekafiki iminyaka owothi ngayo,  Ayindiyolele;

2.verse: lingekabi mnyama ilanga, nokukhanya, nenyanga,  neenkwenkwezi, engekabuyi amafu emva kwemvula;

3.verse: loo mini baya kungevezela abagcini bendlu, agobe amadoda anobukroti, ziyeke iintokazi ezisilayo ngokuba zimbalwa, kube mnyama kwabakhangela ngeefestile;

4.verse: zivalwe iingcango ngasesitratweni, kwakubon ukuba sidambile isandi sokusila, evuka kwazisathetha iintaka,  zinqwilile zonke iintombi zengoma;

5.verse: naxeshikweni baya kuzoyika iindawo eziphakamileyo, neento eziqhiphula umbilini zibe sendleleni; utyatyambe umamangile,  uchabachabase umqhathu, utshitshe umnqweno; ngokuba umntu esiya ekhayeni lakhe laphakade, bajikajike ezitratweni abambambazeli;

6.verse: ingekaqhawuki intambo yesilivere, lityumke iselwa legolide,  uqhekeke umphanda emthonjeni, yaphuke ivili iwe equleni;

7.verse: lungekabuyeli emhlabeni uthuli, njengoko belunjalo, umoya ubuyele kuThixo owawunikayo.

8.verse: Amampunge awo amampunge, itsho iNtshumayeli; into yonke ingamampunge.

9.verse: Phezu koko, ngokuba iNtshumayeli ibisisilumko, yamana ibafundisa abantu ukwazi, yalinganisela, yabagocagoca, yayila imizekeliso emininzi.

10.verse: INtshumayeli yafuna, inga ingafumana amazwi anandiphekayo,  kuthi nokubhalwayo kulunge, ibe ngamazwi enyaniso.

11.verse: Amazwi ezilumko anjengeemviko; anjengezikhonkwane ezitshonisiweyo asezintlanganiseleni, anikwe ngumalusi emnye.

12.verse: Nangaphezu koko, nyana wam, vuseleleka; ukwenza iincwadi ezininzi akunakuphela, nokuphikela ukufunda okuninzi kudinisa inyama.

13.verse: Ukuhlanganiswa kwentetho, yakuba ivakele into yonke,  nanku: Yoyika uThixo, ugcine imithetho yakhe; ngokuba indawo leyo yimfanelo yoluntu lonke.

14.verse: Ngokuba izenzo zonke uThixo uya kuzizisa ekugwetyweni,  izinto zonke ezifihlakeleyo, nokuba zilungile nokuba zimbi.
